title: DOOMED / CURTAINS
description: Safety Curtains blocking entrance to Dicemaker. (p.s. they are made of metal not wood, apparently)

dialogueTree.title: Safety Curtains: "As before, an iron safety curtain c..."
dialogueTree.text: As before, an iron safety curtain curves before your eyes. It covers half the room -- blocking the way into a colossal industrial chimney.

links.title: Logic: "This is directly above the central..."
links.text: This is directly above the central furnace in the cellar. The voices probably came from here.

links.title: You: "Knock on it."
links.text: Knock on it.

links.title: Safety Curtains: "What an odd thing to do.... Nothing..."
links.text: What an odd thing to do.... Nothing happens.

links.title: You: "Knock on it harder."
links.text: Knock on it harder.

links.title: Safety Curtains: "Still nothing. No one's home."
links.text: Still nothing. No one's home.

links.title: You: "Knock *even* harder!"
links.text: Knock *even* harder!

links.title: Safety Curtains: "Those curtains prove to be surprisi..."
links.text: Those curtains prove to be surprisingly sturdy... Your fist hurts now.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There must be another way to wake..."
links.text: "There must be another way to wake up whoever is in there... Maybe we can try yelling into the furnace downstairs?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There must be another way to wake..."
links.text: "There must be another way to wake up whoever is in there... Maybe we should ask the lady in the bookstore what's going on here?"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "There must be another way to wake u..."
links.text: There must be another way to wake up whoever is in there... Maybe you should try yelling into the furnace downstairs?

links.title: Logic: "There must be another way to wake u..."
links.text: There must be another way to wake up whoever is in there... Maybe you should talk to the lady in the bookstore, ask what's going on?

links.title: Logic: "If this is really an entrance to th..."
links.text: If this is really an entrance to the chimney then there must be a furnace somewhere as well. Maybe there's another way to get in?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Can you please try to refrain from..."
links.text: "Can you please try to refrain from attacking random things?"

links.title: You: ""I need to find the *malignant enti..."
links.text: "I need to find the *malignant entity*, Kim. This is the chimney."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "Ghosts aren'..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "Ghosts aren't real, didn't your parents tell you that? In any case, there's no way we can get in right now. Let's investigate further."

links.title: You: ""This is not random, this is *signi..."
links.text: "This is not random, this is *significant*. I want to see what's on the other side."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why do you think there's something..."
links.text: "Why do you think there's something on the other side necessarily?" the lieutenant asks, but you can see a spark of curiosity in his eyes.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In any case, there's no way we can..."
links.text: "In any case, there's no way we can get in right now. Let's investigate further."

links.title: You: ""I can try..." (Blow gently on your..."
links.text: "I can try..." (Blow gently on your bruised knuckles.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thanks.""
links.text: "Thanks."

links.title: You: ""Hello? I yelled, but it didn't wor..."
links.text: "Hello? I yelled, but it didn't work..."

links.title: Safety Curtains: "Again your voice becomes a raspy cr..."
links.text: Again your voice becomes a raspy croak, mid-sentence. It's silent in the abandoned office building -- no one answers you.

links.title: Empathy: "A sudden bout of self pity comes ov..."
links.text: A sudden bout of self pity comes over you.

links.title: Drama: "Sire, may we suggest something? Thi..."
links.text: Sire, may we suggest something? Think of the yelling-into-the-furnace as a *grand performance*. Use your chest voice, not your head voice. Sing from the diaphragm.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Perhaps it's not such a bad idea? T..."
links.text: Perhaps it's not such a bad idea? Try it again, son.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You took your shot and still missed..."
links.text: You took your shot and still missed. Well, you did your best, champ. Shame it wasn't good enough.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Safety Curtains: "An iron safety curtain curves befor..."
dialogueTree.text: An iron safety curtain curves before your eyes, folded like a bellows. It covers half the room -- blocking the way into a colossal industrial chimney.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This must be where the *Entity* liv..."
links.text: This must be where the *Entity* lives...
